plugins.name: Frame
plugins.description:
"Frame" is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your workflow by providing intuitive tools for repositioning and resizing objects within their parent frames.


Buy me coffee


Simply select the object you wish to reposition or resize, and then choose from a variety of predefined options in the "Frame" plugin panel. Whether you're aligning objects to the left, center, or right, or resizing them to occupy a specific portion of their parent frame, "Frame" makes the process quick and effortless.

accepted.name: Sunny
accepted.description: Solving some of the use cases my team encounters when working in Figma.

plugins.tagline: Resize and re-position objects quickly

82589.name: Frame

Simply select the object you wish to reposition or resize, and then choose from a variety of predefined options in the "Frame" plugin panel. Whether you're aligning objects to the left, center, or right, or resizing them to occupy a specific portion of their parent frame, "Frame" makes the process quick and effortless.

plugins.name: ArcTouch Flutter Theme Generator
plugins.description:
Generate Text Styles

Automatically creates a TextStyleTheme class based on all text styles in your Figma project. This class extends ThemeExtension, allowing seamless integration into your Flutter theme.


Generate Theme

Generates a ColorTheme for each variable collection in your project. Each collection is converted into a ThemeExtension to be used within your Flutter theme. If multiple collections lead to class name conflicts, you can easily rename them in your project.


Generate Color Styles

Creates a const class containing color definitions. This is ideal for projects without design tokens or those that don’t require color variations, providing simple, static color constants.


Generate Design Tokens

Creates const classes for design tokens such as spacings, paddings, and borders.



----------


Meet ArcTouch

ArcTouch creates lovable apps, websites, and connected experiences. Our Flutter development team helps companies design and develop successful cross-platform applications.


Contact us to learn how Flutter can accelerate your product roadmap and maximize your ROI.

accepted.name: ArcTouch
accepted.description:
ArcTouch creates lovable apps, websites, and connected experiences for companies of all sizes.
Learn more at arctouch.com.

plugins.tagline: Generate Flutter ThemeExtension Classes from Figma Variables and Text Styles

plugins.name: Color Palette Generator
plugins.description:
🎨 Color Palette Generator – Your Ultimate Color Companion for Figma


Effortlessly create stunning and harmonious color palettes with the enhanced Color Palette Generator. Whether you’re designing for web, mobile, or branding, this plugin offers everything you need from simple color schemes to complex, accessible palettes.


💡 Key Features:


🎯 Palette Generation:

  1. Generate palettes by keyword, random, triadic, analogous, complementary, split-complementary, tetradic, or warm soothing pastels.
  2. Explore color harmony with an interactive color wheel and adjustable saturation/lightness sliders.
  3. Extract colors from images with customizable settings for color count, threshold, and brightness.


⚡ Palette Management:

  1. Apply palettes directly to Figma layers.
  2. Save, load, and delete palettes for future use.


🧑‍💻 Accessibility & Simulation:

  1. Accessibility Check for WCAG contrast compliance.
  2. Color Blindness Simulation (Protanopia, Deuteranopia, Tritanopia) for inclusive design.


🌟 Enhanced UI Experience:

  1. Tabs for basic, pro and image features.
  2. Dark Mode support for seamless design workflows.
  3. User Notifications for real-time feedback.


💥 Design smarter, faster, and more inclusively directly in Figma.


Enhance your design process and craft stunning color combinations with the Color Palette Generator plugin!
plugins.tagline: Effortless color harmony for your designs—generate, apply, and export palettes in one click!

plugins.name: Apply variable modes to all pages
plugins.description:
Apply your current page variable modes to all pages of your file!

Perfect for designers and teams working with design tokens, themes, or variable-based workflows.


How to use

1 - Go to a page (or create one) that has the desired variable modes applied

2 - Click "Apply this to all pages" / "Remove modes from all pages"


Done! You have easily copied the variable modes applied to your current page and apply them to all pages in your file with a single click.
plugins.tagline: Apply your current page variable modes to all pages of your file!

115401.name: Apply variable modes to all pages
115401.description:

Perfect for designers and teams working with design tokens, themes, or variable-based workflows.


How to use

2 - Click "Apply this to all pages" / "Remove modes from all pages"


Done! You have easily copied the variable modes applied to your current page and apply them to all pages in your file with a single click.

manifest.name: Apply variable modes to all pages

115401.tagline: Apply your current page variable modes to all pages of your file!

plugins.name: Design Tokens Analyzer
plugins.description:
This analyzer statically analyzes your CSS and extracts all possible or potential design tokens out of it. This analyzer focuses on the following token types:


Colors

Font sizes

Font families

Line heights

Gradients

Text shadows

Box shadows

Border radiuses

Animation durations

Animation timing functions

CSS Units used
plugins.tagline: Website Visual Design Analyzer - Get CSS Design Tokens

plugins.name: Unit Converter Pro - Measurement Calculator for Figma
plugins.description:
Unit Converter Pro - The Ultimate Measurement Calculator for Figma

Transform your design workflow with the most comprehensive unit conversion tool available for Figma. Unit Converter Pro instantly converts between any measurement units across 8 different categories, saving you valuable design time.

Features:

• Convert between ALL common design units: pixels, inches, cm, points, and more

• Support for 8 conversion categories: Length, Area, Volume, Weight, Temperature, Time, Speed, and Data

• Real-time conversion as you type - see results instantly

• Clean, intuitive interface that matches Figma's design language

• Works directly within your Figma workspace - no need to switch between apps

Perfect for:

• UI/UX designers working across different measurement systems

• Design teams collaborating internationally

• Creating responsive designs that require precise unit conversions

• Print and digital designers who need to convert between physical and digital units

• Anyone who wants to save time on manual calculations

Stop wasting time with manual calculations or switching between apps. Unit Converter Pro handles all your measurement conversion needs in one place, letting you focus on what matters most - your designs.

Convert any unit with just a few clicks and design with confidence!

accepted.name: sadik sajid
accepted.description: Hi, I'm sadik sajid — a passionate designer crafting intuitive and visually engaging digital experiences. I specialize in user interfaces, design systems

plugins.tagline: Designer's Essential Tool: Convert Between All Measurement Units Instantly

plugins.name: Figma to Azure
plugins.description:
Create Azure work items without leaving Figma · figmatoazure.com


Key Features

  1. One-Click Creation: Select any Figma component to generate an Azure Board item.
  2. Automatic Previews: Visuals attach directly to the work item.
  3. Direct Linking: Clickable links between Azure work items and components.
  4. Custom Field Mapping: Match your Azure setup with flexible field configs.
  5. Team Area Support: Organize work in your project’s structure.
  6. Smart Field Detection: Autofills required Azure fields.


Why Teams Use It

  1. Save time—no more screenshots or copy-paste.
  2. Developers get full visual context.
  3. Sync design and dev workflows effortlessly.
  4. Keep everything traceable and connected.


How to Get Started

  1. Select a Figma component
  2. Add your Azure Personal Access Token (requires Read & Write access for work items)
  3. Enter your Azure DevOps URL
  4. Customize the item
  5. Click Create


That’s it—the plugin handles previews, links, and field setup for you.
plugins.tagline: Create Azure work items without leaving Figma

139777.description:

plugins.name: Time2Frame
plugins.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you analyze, adjust, and visualize animation settings in real-time—enhancing precision and efficiency in motion design.


How It Works:


1. Animation Data Extraction

Instantly retrieve animation properties from selected frames, including:

  1. Animation Type: Move In, Fade, Smart Animate, and more.
  2. Direction: Left, Right, Top, Bottom.
  3. Easing Curve: Ease In, Ease Out, Linear, Custom Spring.
  4. Timing Details: Delay and duration (in milliseconds).

Effortlessly gain insights into how animations behave within your prototypes.


2. Frame Rate Conversion

Easily convert animation timing into frame counts based on industry-standard frame rates:

  1. 24 FPS
  2. 30 FPS
  3. 60 FPS

The plugin automatically recalculates delays and durations into frames, ensuring precise control over motion timing.


3. Real-Time Input Adjustments

Modify Delay and Duration values directly in the plugin and see instant updates in:

  1. Milliseconds (for precise timing).
  2. Frames (for seamless animation alignment across FPS settings).

No need for manual calculations—Time2Frame does it all for you.


4. Animation Preview

Visualize how your animation moves, scales, and fades with an interactive preview. The preview dynamically adjusts to reflect extracted animation properties, allowing designers to fine-tune their animations with confidence.


5. Custom Spring Curve Calculation & Visualization

If a Custom Spring easing is detected, Time2Frame breaks it down into:

  1. Stiffness
  2. Damping
  3. Mass

The plugin generates a real-time graph that illustrates the spring curve, making it easy to refine complex motion dynamics.


Key Features:


  1. Animation Data Extraction – Retrieve animation type, easing, and timing in seconds.
  2. Frame Rate Conversion – Automatically convert timing into frames for 24, 30, or 60 FPS.
  3. Instant Adjustments – Modify animation values with real-time updates.
  4. Live Animation Preview – See how animations behave with accurate visual feedback.
  5. Custom Spring Analysis – Break down spring physics and visualize easing curves.
  6. Smart UI Integration – Works seamlessly with Figma’s native environment.


Who Is It For?


Time2Frame is built for motion designers, UX/UI designers, and developers who need precise animation breakdowns and real-time adjustments in Figma. Whether you’re fine-tuning micro-interactions or optimizing complex motion flows, this plugin streamlines your workflow and improves animation predictability across different frame rates.
plugins.tagline: Designed for motion designers—select a frame, instantly analyze its animation settings in real time.

plugins.name: Figma to Storyteq
plugins.description:
Turn your Figma designs into Storyteq dynamic editable ads.


The Figma to Storyteq Plugin enables designers to effortlessly export their Figma designs into Storyteq, turning static visuals into dynamic and customizable ad templates.


Streamline your workflow and scale content production with ease.


  1. Efficient Export – Quickly send your Figma designs to Storyteq in just a few clicks.
  2. Dynamic Template Creation – Convert static designs into adaptable templates ready for automation with Storyteq’s Ad Engine.
  3. User-Friendly Interface – Intuitive, seamless integration between Figma and Storyteq.


How It Works


  1. Design in Figma – Create your visuals as usual.
  2. Export via Plugin – Use the Figma to Storyteq Plugin to send Figma designs to Storyteq.
  3. Customize in Storyteq – Modify and manage your dynamic templates for automated content creation.


Use Cases


  1. Marketing Campaigns – Develop adaptable templates for various assets.
  2. Brand Consistency – Ensure design uniformity across platforms.
  3. Rapid Prototyping – Quickly generate dynamic versions of design concepts.



Getting Started


To begin transforming your static designs into dynamic ad templates, download the Figma to Storyteq Plugin today. This tool is exclusively available for users with an active Storyteq license. Follow these simple steps to integrate your designs with Storyteq:


  1. Sign up for Storyteq if you haven't already.
  2. Run the Storyteq Plugin within Figma.
  3. Authenticate your Storyteq account by logging in.
  4. Follow the plugin’s steps to export and customize your designs.


About


Storyteq helps global brands deliver content faster with the power of automation. Bring teams together to create pixel-perfect campaigns on brand, on time and on budget across markets and channels.


✔ Save Time – Reduce manual work and speed up content production.


✔ Ensure Consistency – Maintain brand integrity across multiple variations.


✔ Scale Easily – Automate and update templates effortlessly in Storyteq.
plugins.tagline: Turn your Figma designs into dynamic editable ads in Storyteq.

plugins.name: Chordio: AI Design Review Copilot
plugins.description:
Chordio – Your AI UX Reviewer


Built by the creators of InVision’s Design System Manager and backed by Y Combinator, Chordio helps you ship confidently with less guesswork.


Chordio is an AI-powered UX reviewer that audits your designs with deep understanding of your brand and guidelines.


Spot issues early – Uncover usability flaws, UX friction, and missed requirements before your work hits the spotlight.


Boost copy and conversion – Get clear, actionable recommendations to tighten messaging and drive results.


Stay on-brand – Automatically audit visuals, tone, and layout against your brand system.


Keep your momentum – Skip the back-and-forth and avoid context switching while waiting on feedback.


Stress less – Catch edge cases before they become last-minute emergencies.


Design smarter. Review faster. Stay the in flow — with Chordio.
plugins.tagline: Get instant feedback on UX copy, best practices, and design system compliance

plugins.name: FigVar - Generate Multiple Variables Instantly
plugins.description:
Welcome to creating variables supaa fast!


Say goodbye to repetitive tasks and manual adjustments. With our plugin, you can create variables effortlessly across your designs, saving valuable time and effort. Focus on the creative aspects of your work while we handle the tedious parts.


How to Use:

  1. Run the Plugin
  2. Select Between Color Variables and Number Variables
  3. Provide a Base Color or Number
  4. Add a Collection Name (Optional)
  5. Add to an Existing Collection (Optional)
  6. Save as Variable (Optional) – If unchecked, it will be saved as a color style
  7. Group Name (Optional)


Need help? I've written a dedicated guide addressing the most frequently asked questions↗ about the plugin. Please have a read before adding comments to the plugin page.
plugins.tagline: Generate multiple color and number variables in one click

plugins.name: Select and Inspect
plugins.description:
Why?


If you ever implemented a Figma plugin, you know how slow the process of inspecting specific properties (among the hundreds available) and values in a Figma file is.


This plugin aims to solve this problem by making logging as easy as possible!


Features

  1. Select one or more Figma elements to get them logged in the Console
  2. Add expressions to be evaluated on the selected Figma elements (name,id,reactions[0].actions results in each expression to be evaluated and logged in the Console)
  3. Stringy and format the result for better readability
  4. Preferences are stored locally


FAQ

Why not using the existing "Inspector" plugin?

Because the properties must be added to the UI by the plugin's author, limiting the plugin's scalability (as you can see in the reviews).
plugins.tagline: Select an item and get it logged in Console

84365.name: Select and Inspect
84365.description:
Why?


If you ever implemented a Figma plugin, you know how slow the process of inspecting specific properties (among the hundreds available) and values in a Figma file is.


This plugin aims to solve this problem by making logging as easy as possible!

  2. Add expressions to be evaluated on the selected Figma elements (name,id,reactions[0].actions results in each expression to be evaluated and logged in the Console)
  3. Stringy and format the result for better readability

FAQ

Because the properties must be added to the UI by the plugin's author, limiting the plugin's scalability (as you can see in the reviews).
84365.release_notes: Invoke evaluated expressions if they are functions and await the returned promises if needed
84365.tagline: Select an item and get it logged in Console

plugins.name: Retro Color Converter
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma designs into nostalgic retro-style PNG images with flexible bit depth control. Perfect for pixel art, game assets, and vintage aesthetics.


Features:

- Color depth options: 6-bit, 9-bit, 12-bit

- Three dithering modes: Flat, Gradient, Full

- Floyd-Steinberg algorithm for smooth transitions

- Auto-positioning next to original objects

- One-click conversion

- Supports all layer types


Ideal for retro games, pixel art, and creative effects. Complete control over color quantization and dithering.
plugins.tagline: Convert designs to retro-style PNG images with customizable bit depth and dithering options

134946.name: Retro Color Converter
134946.description:

- Three dithering modes: Flat, Gradient, Full

- Floyd-Steinberg algorithm for smooth transitions

- Auto-positioning next to original objects

- One-click conversion

- Supports all layer types


Ideal for retro games, pixel art, and creative effects. Complete control over color quantization and dithering.
134946.release_notes: Fixed: Positioning issue for objects inside frames.
134946.tagline: Convert designs to retro-style PNG images with customizable bit depth and dithering options

plugins.name: Smart Rename
plugins.description:
Smart Rename is a powerful Figma plugin built to streamline your workflow by letting you bulk rename frames customizable base names and smart suffixes like version numbers, dimensions, or sequence numbers.


It also fixes a common frustration in UI design: decimal positioning. When frames have non-integer X or Y values, exported assets often end up with unwanted white lines or blurry edges. Smart Rename solves this by auto-aligning frames to the nearest whole pixel, ensuring clean, sharp exports every time.


From organization to export-readiness, this plugin saves time and eliminates manual, error-prone tasks—all in a few clicks.
plugins.tagline: Bulk rename and align Figma frames in seconds. Add version, size, or number suffixes effortlessly.

127628.name: Smart Rename
127628.description:
Smart Rename is a powerful Figma plugin built to streamline your workflow by letting you bulk rename frames customizable base names and smart suffixes like version numbers, dimensions, or sequence numbers.


It also fixes a common frustration in UI design: decimal positioning. When frames have non-integer X or Y values, exported assets often end up with unwanted white lines or blurry edges. Smart Rename solves this by auto-aligning frames to the nearest whole pixel, ensuring clean, sharp exports every time.


From organization to export-readiness, this plugin saves time and eliminates manual, error-prone tasks—all in a few clicks.
127628.tagline: Bulk rename and align Figma frames in seconds. Add version, size, or number suffixes effortlessly.

plugins.name: GradCover
plugins.description:
"Cover Gradient Pro is a Figma plugin crafted specifically for users looking to enhance their design documents with eye-catching gradient covers. Whether it's for branding manuals, product catalogs, or personal portfolios, this plugin assists in swiftly creating professional and visually striking cover designs.


With Cover Gradient Pro, you can expect:


A rich palette of gradient options to diversify your cover design choices.

One-click cover generation to streamline the design process and save valuable time.

Highly customizable gradient features, allowing you to adjust colors and effects to fit your design needs.

Seamless integration with Figma, ensuring your cover designs blend perfectly with your project documents.

To use Cover Gradient Pro, simply select the elements you wish to apply a gradient to, and use the plugin's intuitive controls to choose and adjust your preferred gradient for your cover. Transform your designs with the power of Cover Gradient Pro and give your work the standout cover it deserves."
plugins.tagline: "Cover Gradient Pro - Add Professional Covers to Your Designs"

113610.name: GradCover
113610.description:
"Cover Gradient Pro is a Figma plugin crafted specifically for users looking to enhance their design documents with eye-catching gradient covers. Whether it's for branding manuals, product catalogs, or personal portfolios, this plugin assists in swiftly creating professional and visually striking cover designs.


With Cover Gradient Pro, you can expect:


A rich palette of gradient options to diversify your cover design choices.

One-click cover generation to streamline the design process and save valuable time.

Highly customizable gradient features, allowing you to adjust colors and effects to fit your design needs.

Seamless integration with Figma, ensuring your cover designs blend perfectly with your project documents.

To use Cover Gradient Pro, simply select the elements you wish to apply a gradient to, and use the plugin's intuitive controls to choose and adjust your preferred gradient for your cover. Transform your designs with the power of Cover Gradient Pro and give your work the standout cover it deserves."
113610.tagline: "Cover Gradient Pro - Add Professional Covers to Your Designs"

plugins.name: Icon Stitch
plugins.description:
Icon Stitch is a plugin for exporting icon sets as SVG sprites. It optimizes your icons for the web and exports them as a single file. Icon Stitch streamlines workflow by generating code for easy integration into your projects and is a time-saver tool for developers and designers who need to work with icons.


Key features:


- Create with a single click

- Optimize for performance and web

- Streamline your workflow with generated code

- Validate potential issues and resolve with ease

- Import SVG sprites to visualize file contents


The plugin contains paid features:


The free version allows you to create and export SVG sprites with up to 20 icons.

Consider upgrading to support development and lift the limit.


For technical support, feature requests, and general feedback, please create a new issue on the GitHub repository.


---


Icons from Icons Basic Set.

accepted.name: Raimonds Sarkanbardis
accepted.description: Working hard to make the world better with software.

plugins.tagline: Create and export optimized SVG icon sprites.

plugins.name: Вотермарки MR7
plugins.description:
Этот плагин работает только внутри одноименного дизайн-файла.


Здесь вы можете без боли ставить водяные метки на фото - просто перетащите на канву набор фотографий с компьютера, запустите плагин, выберите опции для расположения логотипа и нажмите "Добавить метки". Как только изображения появятся на экране, нажмите Export в правой панели, выберите 1x PNG, затем Export layers.


Для тех, кто случайно попал сюда:


Этот плагин был разработан для петербургского СМИ и не адаптировался для универсального использования.


Если ваш сценарий использования подходит под этот плагин, вы можете его использовать со своими логотипами. Для этого вам нужно:


  1. Перейти в дизайн-файл по ссылке выше
  2. Разблокировать слой под названием mr7 в секции "Логотип"
  3. Заменить содержимое компонент на свой логотип (желательно в векторном формате) - доступно для использования две версии: в данном случае используются обычная и темная, но можно ставить любые
  4. Запустить плагин и притвориться, что логотипы в интерфейсе соответствуют вашим


Формат изображения "Галерея" масштабирует фото до 2160*1440px, а формат "Обложка" - до 2560*1440px. Нет, пока размер поменять нельзя - он указан в коде. Я планирую адаптировать плагин для универсального использования в будущих версиях.


Если у вас есть вопросы или вы хотите что-то похожее, напишите мне на m.a.zamyatin@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: Ставим плашечки без боли и мучений

124802.name: Вотермарки MR7
124802.description:
Этот плагин работает только внутри одноименного дизайн-файла.


Здесь вы можете без боли ставить водяные метки на фото - просто перетащите на канву набор фотографий с компьютера, запустите плагин, выберите опции для расположения логотипа и нажмите "Добавить метки". Как только изображения появятся на экране, нажмите Export в правой панели, выберите 1x PNG, затем Export layers.


Для тех, кто случайно попал сюда:


Этот плагин был разработан для петербургского СМИ и не адаптировался для универсального использования.


Если ваш сценарий использования подходит под этот плагин, вы можете его использовать со своими логотипами. Для этого вам нужно:


  1. Перейти в дизайн-файл по ссылке выше
  2. Разблокировать слой под названием mr7 в секции "Логотип"
  3. Заменить содержимое компонент на свой логотип (желательно в векторном формате) - доступно для использования две версии: в данном случае используются обычная и темная, но можно ставить любые
  4. Запустить плагин и притвориться, что логотипы в интерфейсе соответствуют вашим


Формат изображения "Галерея" масштабирует фото до 2160*1440px, а формат "Обложка" - до 2560*1440px. Нет, пока размер поменять нельзя - он указан в коде. Я планирую адаптировать плагин для универсального использования в будущих версиях.


Если у вас есть вопросы или вы хотите что-то похожее, напишите мне на m.a.zamyatin@gmail.com.
124802.tagline: Ставим плашечки без боли и мучений

plugins.name: Frame Renamer
plugins.description:
• Automatically detects and names layers based on their type and properties

• Preserves parent frame names while renaming children

• Supports various layer types including:

  1. Auto-layout frames (vertical/horizontal containers)
  2. Text elements (headings, paragraphs, captions)
  3. Components and instances
  4. Images and shapes
  5. Groups and frames
  6. Dividers
  7. Modals
plugins.tagline: Automatically rename layers with semantic, descriptive names based on their properties and content.

plugins.name: Better Title Case
plugins.description:
Not a fan of built-in Figma's title case? Better Title Case got your back!


  1. Select a frame or a group to apply Better Title Case to all text layers inside
  2. Or directly select one or several text layers to apply Better Title Case only to these layers


Safe to use on text layers that have several styles/properties applied to them — plugin will not remove bold or underlined text from your layers.


Current Capitalization Rules:

  1. UPPERCASE words are not processed, so AAPL or MBA will stay as is.
  2. The first and the last word in a sentence are always processed.
  3. There is a custom list of words that shouldn’t be in converted to Title Case: and, as, but, for, if, nor, or, so, yet, a, an, the, as, at, by, for, in, of, off, on, per, to, up, via, vs, v, (vs.) (v.)
  4. Word after em dash and slash processed even if it's a minor word.


If you have any feedback or ideas on improving the plugin — feel free to reach out via email or in comment section 😉.
plugins.tagline: Title Case Plugin We All Deserve

106022.name: Better Title Case
106022.description:

  1. Select a frame or a group to apply Better Title Case to all text layers inside
  2. Or directly select one or several text layers to apply Better Title Case only to these layers


Safe to use on text layers that have several styles/properties applied to them — plugin will not remove bold or underlined text from your layers.

  2. The first and the last word in a sentence are always processed.
  3. There is a custom list of words that shouldn’t be in converted to Title Case: and, as, but, for, if, nor, or, so, yet, a, an, the, as, at, by, for, in, of, off, on, per, to, up, via, vs, v, (vs.) (v.)
  4. Word after em dash and slash processed even if it's a minor word.

plugins.name: Bureau Works
plugins.description:
With Bureau Works, you can translate and localize your Figma files, along with over 40 other file types, using a platform that leverages LLM for enhanced context in your translations.


You have the option to use just our Figma integration or unlock the full power of our Translation Management System.


Our context-first translation platform allows:

  1. Designers,
  2. Marketers,
  3. Agencies,
  4. Localization managers,
  5. Translators,
  6. Developers


To efficiently translate, contextualize, and scale global experiences, all with the support of enterprise-grade hosting and security.


Trusted by global leaders like Harley-Davidson, Scaled Agile, Automation Anywhere, Uber, and Zendesk.


Why Bureau Works?


  1. Beyond translation memories and glossaries: Optimize SEO with the best terms in multiple languages.
  2. Automate translation workflows: Streamline processes to improve efficiency.
  3. Knowledge management: Centralize your content knowledge for better access.
  4. Advanced permissions: Customize access and roles for different team members.
  5. Quality control: Monitor and ensure translation quality with clear indicators, for all content types—from software and Figma to video and eLearning.


Bureau Works empowers over 20,000 users worldwide to stay ahead of the AI translation game.


How to Set Up


To get started, you'll need a Bureau Works account, please signup here


Follow our Integration tutorial here.


Or send a message to our support team here.


Thank you very much for considering our translation platform. Please, dont hesitate to reach out to us through any of the channels above.
plugins.tagline: Bureau Works Integration for Figma

plugins.name: Organize Wiz
plugins.description:
Stop staring at a blank canvas and dive straight into design with Organise Wiz. Our Figma plugin streamlines your workflow by automating tedious setup tasks.


Effortless Page Management:

  • Ditch the clunky process. Create, name, and organise pages with lightning speed.
  • Build a crystal-clear project structure that's intuitive for you and your team.


Blazing-Fast Templates:

  • No more starting from scratch. Launch projects with pre-built, customisable templates designed for your specific needs.
  • Hit the ground running every single time, no matter the project.


Unleash Your Creative Potential:

  • Focus on what you do best – crafting phenomenal designs.
  • Organise Wiz automates the setup drudgery, freeing up valuable time to unleash your creative vision.


Imagine the possibilities. More time spent designing, less time spent organising. Happier designers, more efficient projects. That's the Organise Wiz magic.

accepted.name: Harshvardhan Agarwal
accepted.description: Engineer turned designer, I blend technical know-how with user-centered design principles to tackle product design challenges.

plugins.tagline: Effortless page management unlocks creativity

plugins.name: Holodeck Importer
plugins.description: Requires alpha access to Holodeck. Enables visual previews of Holodeck designs by creating them in a Figma page.
plugins.tagline: Preview designs from Holodeck in Figma

plugins.name: Iconify  - Iconoir Icons Library
plugins.description:
🎨 Iconoir Icons – Iconify Library brings the full Iconoir icon set — one of the largest open-source icon collections — right into your Figma workflow. Whether you're working on dashboards, mobile apps, or sleek landing pages, Iconoir’s minimal and modern design fits perfectly into any project. 🖼️📱


This plugin, powered by Iconify, lets you search, preview, and insert icons effortlessly, without ever leaving Figma. No downloading, no importing SVGs manually — just clean, scalable icons ready to drop into your canvas. ✨


💡 Key Features:


🧩 Full access to the Iconoir icon set (1,500+ icons)


🔍 Fast, intuitive search with real-time previews


⚡ One-click insert into your Figma design


🖌️ Customizable stroke width and color


🆓 100% free and open-source via Iconify


🔄 Always up to date with the latest icons

accepted.name: sadik sajid
accepted.description: Hi, I'm sadik sajid — a passionate designer crafting intuitive and visually engaging digital experiences. I specialize in user interfaces, design systems

plugins.tagline: 🧩 Iconoir Icons by Iconify – Free, modern, and fully customizable icons for your Figma designs 🎨
